alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Cherokee; Greater Oconee; Greater Pickens; Northern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 09 at 3:48AM EDT until April 10 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the first Frost Advisory, temperatures in the mid 30s will result in frost formation. For the second Frost Advisory, temperatures in the mid to low 30s will result in frost formation. * WHERE...In Georgia, Stephens and Franklin Counties. In North Carolina, Cabarrus County. In South Carolina, Cherokee, Greater Oconee, Greater Pickens, Central Greenville and Northern Spartanburg Counties. * WHEN...For the first Frost Advisory, until 9 AM EDT this morning. For the second Frost Advisory, from 2 AM to 9 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Cherokee; Greater Oconee; Greater Pickens; Northern Spartanburg
